author: Reuters Editorial
title: Shell JV Deer Park, Texas refinery completes overhaul: sources
text:
HOUSTON (Reuters) - Royal Dutch Shell Plc completed the planned overhaul of multiple units at its 325,700 barrel-per-day (bpd), joint-venture refinery in Deer Park, Texas, sources familiar with plant operations said on Tuesday.
FILE PHOTO - Filled oil drums are seen at Royal Dutch Shell Plc's lubricants blending plant in the town of Torzhok, north-west of Tver, November 7, 2014. REUTERS/Sergei Karpukhin/File Photo The overhaul included the 270,000 bpd crude distillation unit and 67,000 bpd hydrocracking unit, the sources said.
Reporting by Erwin Seba; Editing by Tom Brown
